name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Boil spaghetti. Cook bacon. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all with pepper.

name: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Cook fettuccine. Sauté chicken. Make Alfredo sauce. Combine all.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook beef with seasoning. Assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

name: Margherita Pizza
instructions: Spread sauce on dough. Add cheese and basil. Bake until crust is golden.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing. Top with croutons and cheese.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter bread. Place cheese between slices. Grill until golden brown.

name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add milk and egg. Cook on griddle. Serve with butter.

name: Tomato Soup
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic. Add tomatoes and broth. Simmer and blend. Stir in cream.

name: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Cook beef and onions. Add mushrooms and broth. Stir in sour cream. Serve over noodles.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Cream butter and sugars. Add eggs and flour. Stir in chips. Bake until golden.

name: Lasagna
instructions: Layer noodles, sauce, beef, and cheese. Bake until bubbly.

name: Greek Salad
instructions: Chop vegetables. Toss with feta, olives, oil, and oregano.

name: BBQ Chicken Wings
instructions: Season wings. Bake and coat with BBQ sauce.

name: Baked Salmon
instructions: Season salmon with lemon, dill, oil, salt, and pepper. Bake until done.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Sauté vegetables with garlic and ginger. Add soy sauce. Serve over rice.

name: Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs with milk. Cook in skillet with fillings. Fold and serve.

name: French Toast
instructions: Dip bread in egg mixture. Cook on griddle until golden.

name: Shrimp Scampi
instructions: Sauté garlic in butter. Add shrimp, lemon, and wine. Cook until shrimp are done.

name: Minestrone Soup
instructions: Cook vegetables. Add tomatoes, beans, and broth. Simmer with pasta and spinach.

name: Cheeseburger
instructions: Form patties and grill. Assemble burgers with toppings.
